name: DynaBIMToolbox
description:
Package Version 2.0.0 is compatible with .NET 8.0 version and Revit 2025 and 2026

Main objectives of this package version is performing Boolean and Solid operations directly in the API, aimed for improved performance of time - consuming tasks.   

Secondary objective is optimised data extraction from host model and linked elements. Many other handy nodes for data extraction, list operations and sorting are also available

Detailed documentation can be found in the GitHub repo: https://github.com/Danail-Momchilov/DynaBIMToolbox

For additional information, feedback and requests, please visit this topic on the forum: https://forum.dynamobim.com/t/new-package-dynabimtoolbox/95743/15
